exm.mng: bossy and domineering, throwing one's weight about
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534), also written 拓拔
to trip forwards or stumble back (idiom, from Book of Songs); can't get anything right

exm.cur: 充满希望的跋涉比到达目的地更能给人乐趣
exm.trd: 充滿希望的跋涉比到達目的地更能給人樂趣
exm.mng: It is better to travel hopefully than to arrive.
exm.pyn: chōng mǎn xī wàng de bá shè bǐ dào dá mù dì dì gēng néng gěi rén lè qù

exm.mng: to travel over land and water (idiom)
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
